mapper.select: SELECT post.pno AS pno, post.title AS title, post.writer AS writer, post.content AS content, post.view_count AS viewCount, post.reg_date AS regDate, post.update_date AS updateDate FROM board_ex.tb_posts post WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY pno DESC

SELECT post.pno AS pno, post.title AS title, post.writer AS writer, post.content AS content, post.view_count AS viewCount, post.reg_date AS regDate, post.update_date AS updateDate FROM board_ex.tb_posts post WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_ex.tb_posts ( title, writer, content, view_count, reg_date ) VALUE ( #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, 0, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_ex.tb_posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() WHERE pno = #{pno}
